titleStmt.title: A frutefull booke of the comon places of all S. Pauls Epistles right necessarye for all sortes of people, but especially for those of the ministerye dyligentelye sette foorthe by Thomas Paniell. Anno. 1562
Bible. N.T. Epistles. English. Selections.
titleStmt.author: Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Tisdale, and are to be solde at his shoppe in the vpper end of Lombarde strete in All-hallowes churchyarde nere vnto grace churche,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The common places of all S. Paules Epistles.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
